Brands Hatch camera showdown

09 Nov 2025

We took a bunch of photography gear to Brands Hatch. One of the cameras was my current favourite toy, this F601 with 75-300mm.

Snap snap!

Representing modernity we had a Fuji XS20, Sigma 16-300mm. In the middle we had a Nikon D3300, 70-300mm. Can you guess which photo was taken with which camera?

TCRs struggle for grip at Druids.

Tasty TCR.

Greasy conditions and front wheel drive means endless understeer.

Saxo appeal.

Heavy metal.

If you’re looking to get some film developed, give The Film Safe a go. Top people and great results.
